title: League Update Time?
body: I've been playing league for over a year now but I still haven't noticed, when does league update? I'm guessing every two weeks? Or is it always random? When is patch 6.22 coming out? Can't wait to try out the new assassins  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Patches come out whenever they're ready. It's impossible to say that there's a specific schedule, because there are sometimes delays or smaller patches that could mess up any sort of schedule if there was one.

Sit tight and keep an eye on the [News page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement for patch 6.22. Let me know if you have any questions.
